alldb.table_sql: SELECT t.ID as id, t.OWN_NAME as ownname, t.OWN_NUMBER as ownnumber, t.LEASECONSIGNER as leaseconsigner, t.LEASE_REGISTER_ADDR as leaseregisteraddr, t.LEASE_ADDR as leaseaddr, t.LEASE_PERSON as leaseperson, t.LEASE_POSTCODE as leasepostcode, t.LEASE_LINKMAN as leaselinkman, t.LEASE_TEL as leasetel, t.LEASE_FAX as leasefax, t.LEASE_EMAIL as leaseemail, t.ORG_CODE as orgcode FROM own_info t
